TEXT.TITLE: HONG KONG BANKS LEAVE INTEREST RATES UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: The Hong Kong Association of Banks said it decided to leave interest rates unchanged at today's regular weekly meeting. Current rates are 1-3/4 pct for savings accounts, 24-hours, seven-day call, one-week and two-weeks. One-month is 2-1/4 pct, two-months 2-1/2 pct, three- and six-months are both three pct, nine-months 3-1/4 pct and 12-months 3-3/4 pct. Prime rate is six pct. REUTER
